page.title: 09Post Office, Swanton Morley
page.content:
Mrs. Gaskin moved into the sub-post office in September 1984. It is open from 9.00-5.30.with an hour off for lunch from 1 till 2. On Friday and Saturday the post office closes at 1.p.m. There are 2 postal collections each week day at 9.45 and 3.45.
The main business is:- family allowances, pensions,and unemployment benefit. Other business includes the sale of stamps, parcel collection, postal orders, dog and T.V. licences.
The day starts with the alarm systems being switched off at 9.00, the safes unlocked,and the date stamp changed and ends at 5.30 when the alarm is switched on again. The busiest times are the weekday mornings.
